nodes.text: The Daggers Point was a Warlord Heavy Cruiser of the Hidden Daggers. It operated in the Kashyyyk system in 1.5 ABY where it was spotted together with a group of Hidden Daggers starfighters.
The Daggers Point is a starship that first appeared in the space part of Sony Online Entertainment's MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies, where it can be found in the Kashyyyk system.
